name: ALPHA 9 III
description: The α9 III is packed with a high-precision image stabilisation unit, advanced gyro sensors, and optimised image stabilisation algorithms to effectively detect and correct camera shake, offering 8.0-step 9 stabilisation.

name: ALPHA 7 CR
description: The Sony a7CR's advanced imaging system is powered by a 61MP Full-Frame Exmor R CMOS sensor and the BIONZ XR processor, a potent combination of incredible resolution with high clarity, low noise, and a wide 15-stop dynamic range.

name: ALPHA 6700
description: The α6700 represents a new generation of APS-C camera bodies with a futuristic fusion of AI-based recognition technology, superlative α-series still image quality, plus moviemaking features and performance from Sony's acclaimed Cinema Line. Still images: Approx. 26.0 megapixels max.

name: ALPHA 7 III
description: Refined for improved speed and low-light performance, a new 24.2MP Exmor R BSI CMOS sensor and BIONZ X processor benefit image quality, video capabilities, and AF performance. The a7 III also sports a revised body design, with a new touchscreen LCD, improved EVF, larger battery, and dual memory card slots.
